column6: House of M tie-in!  It's a knock-down, drag-out brawl, as Psylocke and Marvel Girl race against time to stop the entire universe from being completely obliterated! Guest starring Captain Britain, Juggernaut and Nocturne!
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | writer:Chris Claremont | colorist:Edgar Delgado | inker:Victor Olazaba | letterer:Rus Wooton
